name: The Boy Who Leapt Through Time
name_original: The Boy Who Leapt Through Time
description:
Description:
After being stuck in a tower, you must figure out your new abilities in order to escape the seemingly endless rooms.
Created for Godot Wild Jam #37
Theme: Inside the machine
Wildcards: Time Dilation (used), Hidden Tutorial (not used), Forbidden Palace (used)
Started 9/10/21 ended 9/19/21

Controls:
W - jump
A/D - move left/right
Enter - change time
Esc - Options menu (rebind keys, screen settings, volume settings)

Credits:
Programmer and Artist: Bix Men
Itch page - https://n-thing.itch.io/

Programmer: Craig Ostring @protocraig
Itch page - https://craigostrin.itch.io/

Sound Designer: Giuliano De Pian
Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGKIu73Jj18zQ_McGjCXgRA
